name: MiniMe++
author: kafeijao
description:
Adds more functionality to MiniMe.

- Scale your own MiniMe
- View other people's MiniMe (synced)
  - Requires the other person to have the mod
  - Requires the other person anchor mode to be set to playspace or worldspace
  - Requires the other person MiniMe to be enabled :)

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/MiniMe++) for more in-depth info.
changelog:
- Removed log spam
- Fixed disabling the MiniMe sometimes not clearing it on remote people
- Added button to whether sync or not the MiniMe (fully disables sending and receiving network updates)
